body: In small troll groups, one member is singled out to safeguard the tribe members and the wilderness they call home. Such a troll might have magical power or simply knowledge of the natural world.
name: Troll Defenders

sections.ac: 17, touch 11, flat-footed 16 (+1 deflection, +1 Dex, +6 natural, -1 size)
sections.special_attacks: channel negative energy 3/day (DC 11, 1d6), destructive smite (+1, 4/day), rend (2 claws, 1d6+7)
sections.other_gear: amulet of natural armor +1, ring of protection +1, 50 gp

spells.cleric spells prepared:
(CL 2nd; concentration +3)

1st-bless, divine favor, obscuring mist D, sun metal

0 (at will)-bleed (DC 11), detect magic, resistance, spark

D domain spell; Domains Destruction, Weather

sections.feats: Channel Smite, Improved Iron Will, Iron Will, Weapon Focus (claw)
sections.senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +7

sections.body:
Before Combat The troll acolyte casts bless on herself and her allies.

During Combat The troll acolyte casts divine favor or sun metal, then attacks.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A troll acolyte has tested her devotion to a demon lord by searing her flesh with acid and fire so it must heal naturally, without regeneration.

sections.name: Troll Acolyte
sections.combat_gear: potion of bull's strength, potion of invisibility

sections.ac: 24, touch 14, flat-footed 20 (+5 armor, +1 deflection, +4 Dex, +5 natural, -1 size)
sections.special_attacks: combat style (natural weapon), favored enemy (humans +2), rend (2 claws, 1d6+9)
sections.other_gear: +1 chain shirt, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, 100 gp
sections.feats: Rending Claws, Skill Focus (Perception), Sprinting Troll*, Weapon Focus (claw), Weapon Focus (bite)
sections.senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +15

sections.body: Troll wardens are hunters, messengers, and scouts, tasked with exploring new lands, finding food, and relaying news.

sections.name: Troll Warden
